author: Meridith McGraw and Josh Gerstein
title: Trump allies press administration to unleash lawsuits against lockdowns
description: Conservative activists and religious leaders want Trump's team to fight against state and local restrictions.
content: The letter comes as Trump put pressure on Michigan, Minnesota, and Virginia to ease up on social distancing measures a day after the White House released federal guidelines to reopen the economy. Protests, many led by Trump supporters, have cropped up across … [+2361 chars]
